::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod had broke, inparing his speed. He was caught in the blast, from
the grenade, witvh sent him flying throught the air.
He landed, upside down, a ways away. 
--Stasis lock in 3, 2, 1.-- Hot Rod sliped into stasis.

(OOC: This is my last post untill late tonight. I would appriciate it if
you would leave Hot Rod, undesturbed. That way I don't have to worry
about getting to caught up with the fight.)
